aiProvider.description: Used for selecting the AI provider

apiKey.description: Used for selecting the API Key

appDesc.message: Summarize any webpage or Youtube video with ChatGPT. Get the summary & key takeaways of any article! Summarizer * Summaries * GPT-4

chatGPTProviderDescription.description: Description of the ChatGPT API Provider
chatGPTProviderDescription.message: The API that powers ChatGPT webapp, free, but sometimes unstable

copy.description: Used for copying text to clipboard

defaultQuestion.description: The default question used for ChatGPT
defaultQuestion.message:
Your output should use the following template:

### Summary

### Facts

- [Emoji] Bulletpoint

Your task is to summarize the text I give you in up to seven bulletpoints and start with a short summary. Pick a good matching emoji for every bullet point. Reply in {{SELECTED_LANGUAGE}}. The url to extract facts from is this: {{URL}}. If the url has a paywall or no content use this text: {{CONTENT}}

extractingPageContent.description: Status message used when extracting page content

failedToLoadResponseFromChatGPT.description: Status message used when failed to load response from ChatGPT
failedToLoadResponseFromChatGPT.message: Failed to load response from ChatGPT

installSuccess.description: Success message after installing the extension
installSuccess.message: Ready! Summarize any webpage or Youtube video with one click using ChatGPT Suite! Contact us for any questions or feedback. Happy summarizing!

moreInfo.description: Used for opening a new modal with more info

openAIProviderDescription.description: Description of the OpenAI API Provider
openAIProviderDescription.message: OpenAI official API, more stable, charge by usage

options.description: Used for opening the extension options

pinExtensionTutorial.description: Tutorial message for pinning the extension to the toolbar
pinExtensionTutorial.message: Pin this extension to your toolbar to get started.

rateExtensionInWebstore.message: Enjoy this extension? Give us a 5-star rating at the Chrome Web Store

refreshOpenAILogin.message: Please login and pass Cloudflare check at chat.openai.com

requestOpenAIProvider.description: Status message when failed to load response from OpenAI second time in a row
requestOpenAIProvider.message: OpenAI requires passing a security check every once in a while. If this keeps happening, change AI provider to OpenAI API in the extension options.

reset.description: Used for resetting the extension options

save.description: Used for saving the extension options

thankYouForInstalling.description: Thank you message after installing the extension

tryItNow.description: Action button used after successful installation

voteDown.description: Used for sending Feedback to ChatGPT

voteUp.description: Used for sending Feedback to ChatGPT

waitingForChatGPTResponse.description: Status message used when waiting for ChatGPT response
